top_comments_top.body: not everyone talented gets famous. the ppl who get famous are just the people who get put in front of record execs and they then say yes. it's a fabricated and controlled industry like many others.
It’s okay. It’s nothing spectacular. I think there are so many people right now who have this exact same vocal style.
The most talented singers and actors are rarely the most famous.

Why not just be thankful you live in a time where you get to hear this instead of worrying what other people think and who gets famous? Any other time in history and you only get to hear the famous ones. Beautiful voice.
